{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-21T02:24:31.000Z", "description": "

The Sales Engineer will be self-motivated with a proven track record in technical support roles with mobile or software companies. Must possess strong customer support skills and is able to communicate professionally in oral and written responses with Digital Turbine\u2019s partners. The Sales Engineer must be organized and analytical, able to track issues to resolution and have consistent follow through. Must be comfortable in the dynamic atmosphere of a technical organization with a rapidly expanding customer base.


The Sales Engineer will have responsibility for all partner support at Digital Turbine, working closely with Program and Product Management, Business Development and Sales Teams to successfully on-board new partners. And will provide Tier 1 support to both internal and external customers, working closely with project management, account management, product and engineering to support deployments across partner platforms.


The Sales Engineer will be the key technical interface between the customer and Digital Turbine\u2019s Sales, Account Management and Engineering teams \u2013 serving as the main technical support contact for all new and existing customers during the initial deployment and providing in-life support after launch.


This role will also carry responsibility for refining the technical support processes, as well as reporting on the key performance metrics related to technical customer support.


Key Responsibilities of the Sales Engineer:

\u00b7      Provide software Technical Support for Digital Turbine\u2019s new and existing customers and overseeing customer technical issue resolution

\u00b7      Support Sales & Business Development by providing technical support for new customers from contract to in-life

\u00b7      Responsible for refinement and management of customer technical support processes and documentation

\u00b7      Manage the on-boarding process for multiple, concurrent customers

\u00b7      Convey the technical integration status of new and existing customers

\u00b7      Work with cross functional teams to resolve customer issues related to technical support and help troubleshoot technical issues

\u00b7      Provide direction into Product for future features and functionality that will reduce technical support requirement for customers

\u00b7      Act as primary technical liaison between prospect/customer and Sales, Project Management, Engineering and Management teams

\u00b7      Monitor on-boarding and in-life support processes and report status to stakeholders on an ongoing basis

\u00b7      Consult with business owners on a regular basis to ensure technical support needs are addressed

 

 

Required Skills of the of the Sales Engineer:

\u00b7      B.S. in Computer Science or an equivalent of 4+ years of work experience in Technical Customer Support and/or Technical Account Management (Development support, not IT support), preferably in the Mobile/Android space

\u00b7      Strong understanding of SQL queries, databases, joins etc.

\u00b7      Basic understanding and experience with at least one server-side scripting language: (Python, PHP, Perl)

\u00b7      Well organized, with a sense of urgency with excellent follow-up, and oral/written communication skills

\u00b7      Experience in managing technical support for a large customer base

\u00b7      Able to communicate effectively with business customers, senior management, peers and project staff

 

Preferred Qualifications of the of the Sales Engineer:

\u00b7      Experience in the Mobile/android applications and technical support space

\u00b7      Experience with Online Advertising, Professional Services/SI or Mobile SI Firm experience

\u00b7      Experience in providing Tier 1 Support to external customers

 

About Digital Turbine, Inc:

At Digital Turbine, we believe there is better way for smartphone users to discover new apps and content. Our Mobile Delivery Platform makes it easier than ever for people to discover new apps frictionlessly, for operators and OEMs to build new revenue streams, and for advertisers to reach users at scale. We are a global mobile technology company that is passionate about delivering the right content to the right person at the right time. Digital Turbine has delivered more than one billion app installs for hundreds of advertisers. More than 22 million smartphone users engage with Digital Turbine's software technology each month across more than 30 global operators and OEMs.

Reasons to Work for Digital Turbine:

\u00b7      We\u2019re a leader in an evolving industry \u2013 The mobile app business is booming and changing every day, which means that we are always adapting to stay ahead of the curve.

\u00b7      Take an Opportunity to work with the industry\u2019s top talent \u2013 Many of our employees have over a decade\u2019s worth of experience in the mobile app space. We are a company of \u2018A\u2019 players and only look for the best people to join our team.

\u00b7      We live our values \u2013 We regularly Laugh and applaud our Results with our Global partners.

\u00b7      We\u2019re a company that values diversity & inclusion. Everyone has a voice and can make their mark \u2013 Every employee has the opportunity to implement new processes, design new programs, and be creative within their unique role.

\u00b7      High Growth\u2014We\u2019re growing quickly, which gives our employees exciting opportunities to take on new challenges and have a significant impact on the company\u2019s future.

\u00b7      Flexible work environment \u2013 Employees enjoy coming to work in jeans, working in an open environment, and lounging on couches with their laptop. We offer an unlimited vacation policy too! We work hard but respect our employee\u2019s work/life balance and general well-being. Freedom is one of our values.
